headline: Ask HN: Good review sites and channels by humans
description:
Inspired by the discussions goin on in an earlier thread I would like to ask you guys:

What are good review spaces, that are actually produced by somewhat reliable actual human people .

Some of the examples provided:

https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/

https://linusmediagroup.com/

https://www.notebookcheck.net/

H

Gamers nexus

Hardware Unboxed I think the community must know more and better so please post them here.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 好的评论网站和渠道由人类来完成
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 好的評論網站和渠道由人類來完成
description_zh-Hans:
受之前的讨论启发，我想问问你们：

哪些是好的评论空间，它们实际上是由一些可靠的实际人制作的。

提供的一些例子：

https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/

https://linusmediagroup.com/

https://www.notebookcheck.net/

H

Gamers nexus

Hardware Unboxed 我想社区一定知道更多更好的东西，所以请把它们贴在这里。
description_zh-Hant:
受之前的討論啟發，我想問問你們：

哪些是好的評論空間，它們實際上是由一些可靠的實際人制作的。

提供的一些例子：

https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/

https://linusmediagroup.com/

https://www.notebookcheck.net/

H

Gamers nexus

Hardware Unboxed 我想社區一定知道更多更好的東西，所以請把它們貼在這裡。
